üèù 6 Week Technical Deep Learning Workshop

Starts on the 8th of August, Get tickets!

A six-week hands-on machine learning workshop for programmers and data scientists wanting to break into the AI industry.

About

Over 6 weeks, with 3 contact hours per week, you will get to grips with using Python, TensorFlow and Google Colaboratory. Our experienced instructors will work closely to support you to build your own deep learning models that solve problems across typical domains of deep learning. The workshop series focuses on foundations, embeddings, and computer vision.

Our experienced instructors will work closely to support you to build your own deep learning models that solve problems across typical domains of deep learning. The workshop series focuses on computer vision and embeddings, with an introduction to word embeddings and natural language processing in the final session.

Knowledge is cemented through each week of teaching enabling participants to quickly build their knowledge from the ground up. In order to support learning and development, we also provide "office hours" once per week: a supportive environment in which to complete assigned homework and solidify understanding.

At the end of the workshop series participants will have a showreel of completed projects to demonstrate their ability.

Overview
  • Week 1
    • Showreel and State of the Art
    • Learning vs. Programming
    • Neural Notation
  • Week 2
    • TensorFlow: Computations, Graphs
    • Classification with Fashion MNIST
  • Week 3
    • Convolutions
    • TensorBoard: Visualising learning
  • Week 4
    • Embedding and Autoencoding
    • Unsupervised models
    • Generative models
    • Group projects
  • Week 5
    • Group projects
  • Week 6
    • Further techniques and the future
    • Ethics
Essential details
Duration 6 weeks
Weekly, on Thursdays: 4pm-7pm sharp.
Costs $1,188* per person.
Location CBD
Dates
  • Week 1 - August 8th, 2019
  • Week 2 - August 15th, 2019
  • Week 3 - August 22nd, 2019
  • Week 4 - August 29th, 2019
  • Week 5 - September 5th, 2019
  • Week 6 - September 12th, 2019
Requirements A laptop.
Prerequisites Take our Python Quiz on Google Forms
You should answer at least 70% of the questions in this quiz correctly.

Get tickets!

*Scholarship

There is a crisis of diversity within the field of AI. We know that members of marginalised groups face barries to entry and success within AI, and related fields. To improve the representation of marginalised and under-represented groups in our workshop, and community, we are supporting up to 10 diversity tickets, which are discounted 50% to $594 per person.

To apply for a diversity ticket please complete the scholarship application. If you miss out due to demand, this time around, you are welcome to apply again in the future.

Apply for the Scholarship

Scholarship decisions will be sent out on the 31st of July.
